address: Xã Yên Thái, Huyện Văn Yên, Tỉnh Yên Bái
thought:
**Finding the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Yên Thái"**

Okay, so the user needs the new administrative unit for "Xã Yên Thái, Huyện Văn Yên, Tỉnh Yên Bái."  My process will be straightforward, focusing on identifying the changes due to any administrative restructuring.

First, I identified "Tỉnh Yên Bái" as the original province and "Xã Yên Thái" as the old ward.  Then, the provincial restructuring needed investigation.  I checked the provincial merger resolutions (60-NQ/TW), and sure enough, found that "Tỉnh Yên Bái" had been merged with another province to become "Tỉnh Lào Cai."

With the province now clarified, I moved on to the ward level. I scanned the relevant resolutions, particularly focusing on "Tỉnh Lào Cai," looking for any mention of "Xã Yên Thái." Resolution 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15 stood out. It directly addresses the specific case.  It states, in section 20, that "Xã Yên Thái" was merged along with some other wards and is now part of the new "Xã Mậu A." This is key.

To solidify my findings, I cross-referenced this with my `New wards` data, looking for "Xã Mậu A" and found a perfect match:  a ward with the code "04375" and associated with "Tỉnh Lào Cai."

Therefore, my final output will be a JSON structure containing:

*   `province_name`: "Tỉnh Lào Cai" (due to provincial merger)
*   `ward_name`: "Xã Mậu A" (from the resolution)
*   `ward_code`: "04375" (from the `New wards` data)
*   `citation`:  With the specific section from the resolution clearly defined.
*   `confidence`: High, given the explicit nature of the resolution.

citation.header: 1673/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Lào Cai
citation.line: 20. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Mậu A và các xã Yên Thái, An Thịnh, Mậu Đông, Ngòi A thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Mậu A.
